name: Rebja
tag_list: business-networking, business, networking, social-networking, small-business, medium-business, smb, professional
overview:
Rebja is a business networking community that aims to automatically connect businesses in their areas to enable significant growth of contacts.

Rebja is unique in that they can automatically connect you with other business owners in your area, just as if you had attended a networking event.

Rebja connects you and you can choose wether to continue the connection or reject it, although the more connections you have, the larger business network you will create as you can also manually connect to other like-minded business owners also, meaning your business community will grow substantially.

This provides a great way to gain new business and obtain trusted referals and long lasting relationships.The aim here is to let business owners and key employees connect and help each other achieve their goals whilst creating a true worthwhile business community online.

Key Features include:

Auto connect: Rebja will auto connect you with other business users in your area as an introduction to success and to grow your .

Business profiling: Your business page can be edited with html to include your own logo and colour scheme and create a great marketing place with your contact details displayed. This can be kept private or available for the public to browse.

Community building: The aim here is for businesses to create a true Business Networking community which will connect every business in the area and give everyone the opportunity to show their offering in an extremely cost effective way.
